data.eml:eml: Two new species and five newly recorded species of the genus Udea Guenee from China (Lepidoptera, Crambidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Dandan, Li, Jinwei (2016): Two new species and five newly recorded species of the genus Udea Guenee from China (Lepidoptera, Crambidae). ZooKeys 565: 123-139, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.565.6304, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.565.6304
